content: 28 cid 27 cid 26 cid 25 cid 28 cid 28 cid 11 cid 9 cid 9 cid 28 cid 12 cid 6 cid 10 cid 5 cid 27 cid 1 cid 28 cid 30 cid 16 cid 13 cid 30 cid 8 cid 25 cid 16 cid 30 cid 8 cid 20 cid 3 cid 19 cid 23 cid 30 cid 8 cid 24 cid 30 cid 8 cid 25 cid 16 cid 30 cid 8 cid 20 cid 16 cid 16 cid 28 tips - always use the correct needle for the yarn you choose if the needle is not the size you need the polyester fiberfill may escape from your toy the perfect needle will be 1 or 2 sizes smaller than the one recommended by the yarn maker - always pin the whole toy before sewing the parts this way you can check every part fits correctly in its place - always sew the parts of your toy securely to avoid the toy from being broken - remember to make colour changes in the last step of the last single_crochet of the round - stuff the toy as you go crocheting - criteria is fundamental for reaching a nice result - there are plenty of tutorial videos online make good use of them all rights reserved designed by @myfirstbuddies
